segments.text: this is tough to say , Jordan , but I think we should break up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: but why ? Did I do anything wrong ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: no , we are just too different . This isn ’ t working .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: hey , come on . It ’ s too early to say that . We can fix things .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have thought about it for a while . I think it ’ s time to move on for both of us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I knew this would happen some day ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: then why didn ’ t you talk to me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well . It ’ s not all my fault , Anna ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't want to argue with you anymore . This is going to be tough , but Let ’ s try and be friends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like that Anna , but I think I ’ ll need a little space for a bit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think we ’ ll be better off if we are apart .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure , let ’ s just be friends .
segments.speaker: S1
